Description: CloudFormation template for a serverless application with three Lambda functions (items, users, orders), DynamoDB tables, and API Gateway endpoints

Properties.Description: API Gateway REST API with endpoints for items, users, and orders

ApiGatewayUrl.Description: URL of the deployed API Gateway

ItemsTableName.Description: Name of the Items DynamoDB table

UsersTableName.Description: Name of the Users DynamoDB table

OrdersTableName.Description: Name of the Orders DynamoDB table
